survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experiences with AI-powered customer support tools across various industries.

questions.question_text: How often do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer support features have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Ensure 'None of the above' is exclusive if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer support features have you used? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your overall experience using AI-powered customer support tools? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your overall experience using AI-powered customer support tools? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered customer support tools?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected '1', '2', or '3' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question. Provide a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered customer support tools?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected '1', '2', or '3' in Q3

questions.question_text: Would you prefer human customer support over AI-powered tools in critical situations?
